1.verse_text: You call out to God for help and he helps–he"s a good Father that way. But don"t forget, he"s also a responsible Father, and won"t let you get by with sloppy living.

3.verse_text: The same goes for you husbands: Be good husbands to your wives. Honor them, delight in them. As women they lack some of your advantages. But in the new life of God"s grace, you"re equals. Treat your wives, then, as equals so your prayers don"t run aground.

4.verse_text: Listen to the Message. It was preached to those believers who are now dead, and yet even though they died (just as all people must), they will still get in on the life that God has given in Jesus.

5.verse_text: I"m sending this brief letter to you by Silas, a most dependable brother. I have the highest regard for him.
